channel.title: Needing the easier, faster, and stable server source for a low pc
channel.description:
Hello, i would like to have a server source really stable, not laggy and null, and with not loots of laggy features, just one cool but that can hold 40-60 people in a 224mb computer, pentium 4.
thanks for help.
facundo.

item.title: Needing the easier, faster, and stable server source for a low pc
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

OK i dont have a server for you but i do have some advice…
You say your computer stinks for hosting but you can use the internet…so…
learn java and join a development team. thats your best option…
Your other option is raise money for a dedicated server. lol

Read full topic
